term.title: bubble column

item.text: A bioreactor, in the shape of a column, in which the reaction medium is kept mixed and aerated by introduction of air into the bottom (cf. air lift bioreactor).

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 149 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)

term.citation: Citation: 'bubble column' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.B00750
